venue.name: Middlesex Fells - Off RT 28 Sheepfold Parking Area

item.description:
The Fells is close to Boston (10min north on 93) with nice views looking south to the city.  This hike is ideal for beginner hikers or people just getting back into shape. Total hike will be about 3 Miles but we will likely have an optional extension of 1.5 miles for those that want to continue after main hike.  The terrain is fairly flat with some short climbs.  You do not need hiking shoes, running shoes will be OK for this hike.  Please bring water and a snack.

We will meet at the sheepfold parking lot.  Please wait near the trail map sign .

This hike will be the first of a series of progressively more difficult hikes leading up to Memorial Day weekend.  

Check out this Map, Sheepfold is near the middle of the reservation, just off Fellsway West.

http://www.mass.gov/dcr/parks/metroboston/maps/fells.gif
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the upper parking lot near the trail map sign
item.name: Beginner Hike @ Fells Reservation
